sentences: Keskkooli elu oli mul väga meeldejääv.
context: The word 'keskkooli' is the genitive case of 'keskkool', which means 'high school'. In Estonian, '-i' ending often indicates possession or relationship. So 'keskkooli' can mean 'of high school', 'to high school', or be used in possessive constructions like 'my high school's'. It appears to be formed from 'kesk-' (middle) + 'kool' (school).
